hero.subtitle: The system that turns your friend who 'doesn't get crypto' into a holder, DAO contributor, and protagonist of their financial freedom. No gas. No complexity. No fear.

problem.title: Adoption Breaks at the First Step
problem.subtitle: 73% say crypto is 'too complicated'. But 89% of those same people have gifted money at least once. What if the GIFT was the door to Web3?
problem.problem1: Install wallet, save seed phrase, pay gas... too many barriers
problem.problem2: Most crypto on-ramps are cold and transactional
problem.problem3: Intimidating tutorials that generate fear, not trust
problem.problem4: Real adoption only happens when there's emotional connection
problem.solution1: A meaningful gift turns curiosity into trust
problem.solution2: Your NFT IS a real wallet (ERC-6551 Token Bound Account)
problem.solution3: Art opens the vault; the vault scales to millions
problem.solution4: Gifting financial freedom: a pact with the future

howItWorks.title: The Magic in 3 Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: From 'I don't get crypto' to holder in 5 minutes. That simple.

step1.title: Receive the Gift
step1.desc: A link or QR with something that matters: a photo, a memory, a message. No seed phrases, no gas, no fear.

step2.title: Learn the Essentials
step2.desc: Short Academy modules unlock your gift. The emotional factor drives real learning.

step3.title: You're a Holder
step3.desc: First non-custodial wallet + funds + knowledge to move in Web3. Your story as a holder begins.

features.title: Technology That Disappears
features.subtitle: Complexity evaporates. Only the magic of the gift remains.

nftWallet.title: Your NFT IS Your Wallet
nftWallet.desc: Like if your profile picture could hold money. ERC-6551 turns art into vault.

gasless.title: Gas = $0 Always
gasless.desc: Account Abstraction eliminates friction. Zero fees. Zero excuses.

learn.title: Emotional Academy
learn.desc: The gift isn't released until learning is complete. Real motivation, not cold tutorials.

referrals.title: The Viral Effect
referrals.desc: Every gifted friend tends to gift the next one. 3 levels of on-chain rewards.

governance.title: Your Voice, Your Power
governance.desc: Real DAO governance with Aragon. Proposals, votes, treasury. Your effort = your vote.

security.title: Radical Transparency
security.desc: Everything on-chain, auditable in real-time. No black boxes. No custodians. No tricks.

token.title: CryptoGift Coin
token.desc: CGC is more than a token: it's your voice in a community that believes in the human adoption of Web3. Each CGC represents real participation.

cta.title: The Best Gift Was Never the Object
cta.subtitle: It was the door it opens. Today that door is blockchain, and the key fits in an NFT-wallet that beats with story, with value... and with future.

team.title: The Team
team.subtitle: Lean, founder-led team combining product, Web3 dev and growth. 104 days of closed beta with 0 critical bugs and 85.7% claim rate. Ready to scale with funding & partners.

metadata.description: Special invitation to join CryptoGift DAO

brand.name: CryptoGift
brand.description: Decentralized governance for the CryptoGift ecosystem. Learn. Earn. Co-govern.

bottom.copyright: ¬© 2025 CryptoGift Wallets DAO. A project by The Moon in a Box Inc. All rights reserved.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.subtitle: Complete technical documentation of the CryptoGift Wallets DAO ecosystem

executive.title: Executive Summary
executive.content: CryptoGift Wallets DAO represents a natural evolution of the CryptoGift ecosystem, transforming Web3 education into a decentralized governance model where learning becomes decision-making power. Built on Base (Ethereum L2), the DAO empowers its community to co-govern the protocol while learning and earning.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: From zero to Web3‚Äîtogether. Learn. Earn. Co-govern.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Democratize access to Web3 through a system where completing educational quests generates governance tokens, turning learning effort into voice and vote in the protocol's future.

barriersList.complexity: Technical complexity: The blockchain learning curve intimidates new users
barriersList.incentives: Lack of incentives: Traditional education doesn't reward progress
barriersList.disconnection: Governance-community disconnection: Protocols governed by early adopters with capital
barriersList.noPath: No clear path: No structured route from beginner to contributor

limitationsList.airdrop: Airdrop farming: Mercenary behavior without real commitment
limitationsList.voteBuying: Vote buying: Power concentration in whales
limitationsList.superficial: Superficial participation: Users voting without understanding proposals
limitationsList.disconnectedEdu: Disconnected education: Courses that don't lead to active participation

solution.title: The Solution: CryptoGift Wallets DAO
solution.flow: User ‚Üí Quest Completed ‚Üí EAS Attestation ‚Üí MilestoneEscrow ‚Üí CGC Tokens ‚Üí Governance Power

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This documentation is a living document that evolves with community feedback. CGC tokens are pure governance tokens and DO NOT constitute securities nor grant economic or financial rights. There is no 'revenue sharing' associated with the CGC token. The token grants exclusively governance rights and access to protocol features. Participate at your own risk.
